Excellent release. I only have one bone to pick at d3f3nd3r.. "Master of Puppets" sounds like it was ripped from a cassette - I can hear a constant high pitched digital gurgling sound in the background (the same kind you hear when you go overboard with digital noise reduction/cancelling). I thought it was a bad rip (64 - 96 kbps - then upped to 320), but my suspicions tell me it's from an over-dose of noise reduction. EQ is a little off when I compare it to the original CD, so it has to be recorded directly from a cassette. Bad rip, but the rest seem good.
